original_text: The Lord spoke to Jeremiah when King Zedekiah had ruled Judah for ten years. At that time, King Nebuchadnezzar had ruled in Babylon for 18 years.
korean_text: 유다의 시드기야 왕 열째 해 곧 느부갓네살 열여덟째 해에 여호와의 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라

sentences.original_text: when King Zedekiah had ruled Judah for ten years
sentences.korean_translation: 시드기야 왕이 유다를 다스린 지 십 년이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar had ruled in Babylon for 18 years
sentences.korean_translation: 느부갓네살 왕이 바빌론에서 다스린 지 십팔 년이 되었다
